<br /><br />
We have a special offer again for the LET community. These promos are recurring and are only available for a limited time.<br /><br />

##Including:

* cPanel
* Website Builder (Standard+Pro)
* Softaculous
* Jetbackup (Standard+Pro)
* Cloudflare
* Free SSL certificates
* PHP Selector (5.x-7.x)
* ModSecurity
* SSH (Pro)
* Dedicated IP (optional, 1€/month)

<br /><br />
##EU-Basic
Storage: 1GB
Monthly Bandwidth: 50GB
**Price: 6$/year**

<br /><br />
##EU-Standard
Storage: 5GB
Monthly Bandwidth: 250GB
**Price: 12$/year**

<br /><br />
##EU-Pro
Storage: 20GB
Monthly Bandwidth: 1000GB
**Price 24$/year**

<br /><br />
**[https://www.ms-cloud.at/promotions/let-promo.html](https://www.ms-cloud.at/promotions/let-promo.html)**<br />
___
Setup is done within 24 hours, we manually approve every order. If you have any questions, please [contact our Sales-Team](https://client.ms-cloud.at/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=2&language=english).
